hero_description: Passionate about building secure digital solutions and exploring innovative technologies. I specialize in cross-platform app development, and cybersecurity research.

I specialize in cross-platform software development and in crafting innovative solutions that strengthen the security of digital systems.
about_description_2: My journey began with a deep curiosity to understand how systems work and how to secure them, which led me to specialize in information security and full-stack development. I continue to explore and build purposeful, practical tech solutions.

desc_bank_app: A desktop application built with C# to manage core banking operations including account creation, withdrawal, deposit, update, and deletion, with a user-friendly interface.
desc_read_library: Read is an educational website offering a collection of books and video courses across various fields, with a clean interface and informative pages for easy exploration.
desc_ISO_standard: A concise theoretical research on the ISO 27001 standard in Information Security Management. It covers core concepts, scope, ISMS components, security controls, certification process, benefits, challenges, a comparison with related standards, and a practical case study in a tech company.
desc_pentest_tool: Custom penetration testing toolkit for web application security assessment with automated reporting.
desc_employee_affairs_app: A C# desktop application for managing employee affairs within a company. It handles adding, editing, and deleting employees and departments, as well as managing salaries, incentives, and company information.
desc_tasks_website: A simple one-page task manager that lets users add tasks with automatic creation dates, mark them as completed with a color change, and easily edit task names.
desc_hospital_odoo: A comprehensive web-based system built with Odoo for managing patient data in hospitals. It supports manual data entry and file uploads, offers advanced search, record viewing, and detailed report generation. The system includes user management, tracking of active accounts, and auditing of all system activitiesâ€”enhancing both operational efficiency and medical oversight.
desc_students_odoo: An Odoo-based student registration system that allows entry of basic student data and tracks their academic status (new or graduated)
desc_safe_c_lib: A custom C library that consolidates safer versions of common functions like copy and read to reduce buffer overflow risks and enhance secure usage.
desc_Predict_the_cost_of_treatment: An AI model trained on a dataset to predict treatment costs based on medical criteria, designed to support decision-making and cost analysis.
desc_Face_Recognition: A simple face recognition system built with Python libraries, using a folder of images as the database. It enables accurate face detection and identity matching.
